com.datamelt.util

Class ClassUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datamelt.util.ClassUtility

  • public class ClassUtility
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to translate types, retrieve methods and invoke methods on objects
    Author:
    uwe

    • Method Detail

      • getClass

        public static java.lang.Class<?> getClass(java.lang.String type)
        Parameters:
        type - the name of the type according to constants defined in this class
        Returns:
        a Java class corresponding to the type specified

      • getObject

        public static java.lang.Object getObject(java.lang.String type,
                                         java.lang.String value)
        in the xml file of a rule 'type' and 'value' are specified. using these two components, a corresponding object is created. these objects will be passed into a method as an array of objects, so that the method of the objects can be invoked.
        Parameters:
        type - the name of the type according to constants defined in this class
        value - the value for the object to be created
        Returns:
        an object corresponding to the type and value specified. return null if type is unknown or a conversion can not be done.

      • getObjectType

        public static java.lang.String getObjectType(java.lang.Object object)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        evaluates which class type the relevant object is
        Parameters:
        object - an object
        Returns:
        the type of the object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - when a wrong field type was detected

      • invokeObjectMethod

        public static java.lang.Object invokeObjectMethod(java.lang.Object object,
                                                  java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                                  java.util.ArrayList<Parameter> parameters)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Invokes the method on the given object and with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to invoke the method on
        method - the method to be invoked
        parameters - the parameters required for the method
        Returns:
        the object that is created by invoking the method
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an exception if the method can not be invoked

      • invokeObjectSetterMethod

        public static java.lang.Object invokeObjectSetterMethod(java.lang.Object object,
                                                        java.lang.Object resultObject,
                                                        java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                                        java.util.ArrayList<Parameter> parameters)
                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Invokes the setter method on the given object and with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        object - the object to invoke the method on
        resultObject - the resulting object
        method - the method to be invoked
        parameters - the parameters required for the method
        Returns:
        the object that is created by invoking the method
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an exception if the method can not be invoked

        Returns:

      • getActionMethod

        public static java.lang.reflect.Method getActionMethod(XmlAction action)
                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a method of an action.
        Parameters:
        action - the action for which the method is created
        Returns:
        a method for the action
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws an exception if the method can not be created

      • invokeActionMethod

        public static java.lang.Object invokeActionMethod(XmlAction action,
                                                  java.lang.Object[] object,
                                                  java.lang.reflect.Method methodAction)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Invokes a method of an action.
        Parameters:
        action - the action for which the method is created
        object - the object to invoke the action on
        methodAction - the method to invoke
        Returns:
        the resulting object of the invoked method
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws an exception if the method can not be invoked

      • getObjectMethod

        public static java.lang.reflect.Method getObjectMethod(XmlAction action,
                                                       ActionObject actionObject)
                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Get the method corresponding to the given action and the concrete action object.
        Parameters:
        action - the action for which to create the method
        actionObject - the concrete action object
        Returns:
        the method created from the action
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws an exception if the method can not be retrieved for the object

      • getMethods

        public static java.lang.reflect.Method[] getMethods(java.lang.String className)
                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Get all methods of a class.
        Parameters:
        className - the name of the class, including package information
        Returns:
        an array of methods for the given class
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws an exception if the class was not found

      • getCheckId

        public static long getCheckId(java.lang.String className)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Get the checkId of a check class. The id of a check in the database uniquely identifies the check and should not change as the business rules are based on them.
        Parameters:
        className - the name of the class
        Returns:
        the static checkId of the class
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throws an exception if the class was not found or the field is undefined
